description:
Designed for wet days, comfy everyday. When it is less a “probability of precipitation” and more of a guarantee, the Stormburst boots keep your feet nice and dry. In the city or on the trail these supportive boots keep you safe from the elements, so you can enjoy the moment. When it is time to head in, Vessi’s sock-knit construction makes the Stormburst easy to slip on and off.

  • Dyma-tex® waterproof construction keeps your feet dry
  • Sock-knit construction hugs your feet and breathes well
  • Protective rand wraps the base of your foot, adding coverage where it is needed most
  • Dual density midsole provides all-day support
  • Reflective details help keep you seen
  • Lugged outsole offers great grip on a variety of surfaces
name: Vessi Stormburst Waterproof Shoes - Women's
